overview: When girlfriends find themselves at loose ends when it comes to male companionship, their natural talent for nurturing surfaces. When in need, they turn to each other for comfort. Surely if anyone knows what a woman wants, itâ€™s another woman. These women find themselves willing to do just about anything to learn to love other women, if only for a few fleeting moments.
tagline: The shocking story of a young woman craving her step-mother's attention!
title: Please Make Me Lesbian! 4
